games.title: 8 Ball Billiards Classic
games.description: Experience the thrill of realistic pool gameplay with precise physics and stunning graphics.
games.longDescription: 8 Ball Billiards Classic is one of the most authentic pool simulation games available online. This game perfectly captures the essence of traditional 8-ball pool with its realistic physics engine and detailed graphics.
features: Stunning table graphics and ball animations

controls.description: Use your mouse to aim the cue in your desired direction
Pull back the cue stick with your mouse to adjust shot power

games.title: Spades Spider Solitaire
games.description: Enjoy this classic Spider Solitaire card game with a Spades theme in a beautifully designed interface.
games.longDescription: Spades Spider Solitaire combines the traditional Spider Solitaire gameplay with a Spades theme. This addictive card game challenges you to arrange all cards in descending order by suit. Clear the board by building complete sequences from King to Ace and improve your strategic thinking skills.
features: Beautiful card designs with Spades theme
Hint system for when you're stuck
Game timer to track your progress

controls.description: Click and drag cards to move them
Click the deck to deal more cards when available
Use the undo button to revert your last move

games.title: 9-Ball Pool
games.description: Challenge yourself with a different set of pool rules in this exciting 9-ball variant.
games.longDescription: 9-Ball Pool is an exciting variation of the traditional pool game where players must hit balls in numerical order. With the same realistic physics as our 8-ball version, this game offers a fresh challenge for billiards enthusiasts.

controls.description: Use your mouse to aim the cue

games.title: Snooker Master
games.description: Test your precision with the more complex snooker variant on a larger table.
games.longDescription: Snooker Master brings the popular British cue sport to your screen with impressive detail. Play on a full-size snooker table with 22 balls - 15 red and 6 colored. Master the complex rules and build impressive breaks in this challenging game.

controls.description: Use your mouse to aim the cue
Right-click to look around the table

games.title: Arcade Racing
games.description: Experience high-speed thrills in this action-packed arcade racing game.
games.longDescription: Arcade Racing delivers heart-pounding speed on colorful tracks filled with obstacles and power-ups. Race against AI opponents or challenge your friends in this fast-paced racing game that prioritizes fun over simulation.

games.title: Puzzle Blocks
games.description: Train your brain with this addictive block-matching puzzle game.
games.longDescription: Puzzle Blocks combines elements of classic tetris with modern puzzle mechanics. Arrange falling blocks to create complete lines and earn points. Special blocks and power-ups add strategic depth to this seemingly simple but challenging game.
